name: Board Cyber Briefing Frequency
description: Number of cybersecurity briefings provided to board of directors per year
formula: Count of board presentations with cybersecurity risk content

name: Policy Compliance Rate
description: Percentage of organizational units meeting cybersecurity policy requirements

name: Cybersecurity Budget Allocation
description: Percentage of IT budget allocated to cybersecurity

name: Risk Assessment Frequency
description: Number of formal risk assessments conducted per year

name: Security Training Completion Rate
description: Percentage of employees completing mandatory security training

name: Incident Response Plan Testing
description: Frequency of incident response plan testing and updates
formula: Count of IR plan tests/exercises per year

name: Third-Party Risk Assessments
description: Percentage of critical vendors with current security assessments

name: Asset Inventory Accuracy
description: Percentage of IT assets accurately inventoried and classified

name: Vulnerability Scan Coverage
description: Percentage of assets covered by regular vulnerability scanning

name: Critical Vulnerability MTTF (Mean Time to Fix)
description: Average time to remediate critical vulnerabilities
formula: Sum of remediation times / Number of critical vulns

name: Network Mapping Completeness
description: Percentage of network infrastructure documented and mapped

name: Data Classification Completeness
description: Percentage of data assets properly classified by sensitivity
formula: Classified data assets / Total data assets * 100

name: External Attack Surface Discovery
description: Number of externally facing assets discovered vs known
formula: Discovered external assets / Known external assets

name: Business Impact Analysis Coverage
description: Percentage of business processes with completed BIA

name: MFA Coverage (Privileged Accounts)
description: Percentage of privileged accounts protected with multi-factor authentication
formula: Privileged accounts with MFA / Total privileged accounts * 100

name: Patch Compliance (Critical Severity)
description: Percentage of critical patches applied within SLA

name: Email Security Gateway Effectiveness
description: Percentage of malicious emails blocked by email security
formula: Blocked malicious emails / Total malicious emails * 100

name: Endpoint Protection Coverage
description: Percentage of endpoints with active security agent

name: Data Encryption at Rest
description: Percentage of sensitive data encrypted at rest
formula: Encrypted sensitive data / Total sensitive data * 100

name: Network Segmentation Compliance
description: Percentage of network segments properly configured

name: Access Review Completion Rate
description: Percentage of scheduled access reviews completed on time

name: Backup Success Rate
description: Percentage of scheduled backups completed successfully

name: Security Configuration Compliance
description: Percentage of systems meeting security configuration standards

name: Web Application Firewall Coverage
description: Percentage of web applications protected by WAF
formula: Protected web apps / Total web apps * 100

name: Mean Time to Detect (MTTD)
description: Average time from security event to detection
formula: Sum of detection times / Number of incidents

name: Security Event Monitoring Coverage
description: Percentage of critical systems with active monitoring

name: False Positive Rate
description: Percentage of security alerts that are false positives

name: Log Retention Compliance
description: Percentage of systems meeting log retention requirements

name: Threat Intelligence Integration
description: Number of threat intelligence feeds actively integrated
formula: Count of active threat intel feeds

name: Network Traffic Analysis Coverage
description: Percentage of network traffic analyzed for threats

name: Anomaly Detection Effectiveness
description: Percentage of actual threats identified by anomaly detection

name: Mean Time to Respond (MTTR)
description: Average time from incident detection to initial response
formula: Sum of response times / Number of incidents

name: Incident Response Plan Activation
description: Percentage of incidents with formal IR plan activation

name: Communication Plan Execution
description: Percentage of incidents with timely stakeholder communication

name: Containment Effectiveness
description: Percentage of incidents successfully contained within SLA

name: Evidence Collection Success
description: Percentage of incidents with proper evidence collection

name: Post-Incident Review Completion
description: Percentage of incidents with completed post-incident reviews

name: Threat Hunt Execution
description: Number of proactive threat hunts conducted per month

name: Backup Restore Success Rate
description: Percentage of backup restore tests that succeed

name: Recovery Time Objective (RTO) Achievement
description: Percentage of systems meeting RTO during tests
formula: Systems meeting RTO / Total systems tested * 100

name: Recovery Point Objective (RPO) Achievement
description: Percentage of systems meeting RPO during tests
formula: Systems meeting RPO / Total systems tested * 100

name: Business Continuity Plan Testing
description: Frequency of business continuity plan testing
formula: Count of BCP tests per year

name: Communication System Redundancy
description: Percentage of communication systems with backup capability
formula: Redundant comm systems / Total comm systems * 100

name: Vendor Recovery Coordination
description: Percentage of critical vendors with recovery agreements

name: Staff Recovery Training
description: Percentage of critical staff trained on recovery procedures
